</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/environment/{environment}/secret/{secretName}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve value of a secret. Currently, this endpoint can only be used with a user access token.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
